lines.text: Tell me I'm being hysterical, please!
I have a deep depression and I need my pills to pull out of it.
I'm calm. I'm completely calm. You can leave me alone now.
What do you mean, sick? Why isn't he in bed?
Mr. Bauer's sick in the head.
Your eyes, Mrs. Staudte. Your eyes. Take care of yourself.
Don't talk to me, Mr. Bauer.
Is there someone else you can discuss it with?
There's nothing I have to discuss with anyone, Mr. Bauer. Nothing at all.
A pity, Mrs. Staudte. A pity for you. It's important to have someone with whom you can discuss it.
Alcohol is what I need. Alcohol and nothing more.
